meanings.sent1: She will only stay temporarily at the hotel.
meanings.sent2: The store is temporarily closed for renovations.
meanings.sent3: The cat temporarily hid under the bed, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked out from behind the clouds, temporarily brightening the sky.
meanings.sent5: The temporary sign pointed towards the exit, guiding the lost travelers.

meanings.sent1: He decided to temporarily dye his hair a different color.
meanings.sent2: The repair was only temporarily fixed and needed a permanent solution.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel temporarily stole the bird's food, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile temporarily lit up the room, bringing joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The temporary fence kept the curious children away from the construction site.
